Package com.dhemery.polling

Evaluate conditions repeatedly.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Poller
    Repeatedly evaluate a condition until the condition is satisfied.
    Ticker
    Marks time in fixed-size intervals called "ticks" and expires at some instant after starting.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComposedPoller
    A poller composed of objects that perform the specified actions before polling, between polls, on poll failure, and to determine whether to continue polling when the condition is not satisfied.
    SystemClockTicker
    A ticker that uses the system clock to reckon time.
    TickingPoller
    A poller that uses a ticker to delay between polls, and throws a PollTimeoutException if the ticker expires before the condition is satisfied.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PollTimeoutException
    Indicates that a poll's ticker expired before the polled condition was satisfied.

Package com.dhemery.polling Description

Evaluate conditions repeatedly.
